tweet: Lot's going on...  Stay tuned for the "official" launch of the Tweetmatix suite of Twitter tools.  ;)
A lot of forward movement in the last 60 days since starting. See the intro videos at http://tweetmatix.com #tweetmatix
We implemented the new keyword selection tool. It's awesome and helps users accurately pick keywords and phrases to monitor.
One of our users suggest that we add play/pause ability on a per keyword/phrase basis.  It's working! @michaeldaehn
#Tweetmatix is a marketing tool for local businesses & bands. It helps build local connections with relevant individuals.
